question: What is the name of the leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia?
asked_question_translated: Kako se imenuje vodilna razvojna institucija s sedežem na Ptuju v Sloveniji?
answer: Vodilna razvojna institucija s sedežem na Ptuju v Sloveniji je ZRS Bistra Ptuj.
answer_translated_eng: ZRS Bistra Ptuj is the leading development institution based in Ptuj, Slovenia.
